by its preeminence bright superiority
luminous preeminence
moving along
with them like Aldebaran among the lesser twinkling lights of his constellation. That signal ^ shining object signal figure ^ was the "Handsome Sailor" of the picturesque less prosaic era time ^ alike of the military and merchant navies. marine.
